short_summary: Replace Fire Alarm system at Stewart Detachment
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify and only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
# Phase Two - RCMP Stewart Detachment – Fire Alarm Replacement – Stewart, BC
## English
### Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: WS3929166460
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS3929166460
* Publication Date: 2023-04-19
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-11 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-05-01
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-05-10
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-12-31
* Tender Status: Expired
### Goods and Services
* Procurement Category: Customs and Non-Statutory Services (CNST)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* UNSPSC Classification: 
	+ Electrical System Services
	+ Fire Alarm Maintenance or Monitoring
### Contracting Entity and End User
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
	+ Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0R2, Canada
### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Brandie Klyne (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: `brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`

## French

* Date de fin prévue du contrat: 2023-12-31

### Biens et services

* Méthode d'approvisionnement: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres
